page.title: 09POINTON-HOME LIFE
page.content: {HOME LIFE: A Day In My Life by 11 {year old Jane:}My family consists of mum and dad and 5 children.My sister and I are twins. I get up at 7.30am and have cereals, toast and tea for breakfast.Then I catch the double-decker bus that takes me to the Aveland Secondary Modern school in Billingborough. I like school.My favourite subjects are English,Mathematics and History.I hate Games lessons but enjoy swimming in the school pool. School ends at 3.45 pm,and as soon as I get home,I change out of my school clothes and do my Homework or watch Television.We have tea at about 6.00 pm.My favourite food is fish and chips,followed by ice-cream. We help wash up after tea,then either watch T.V.or play tennis.At 9pm it's supper time,then we go to bed.
